ygData.subject: New molds and armor type?
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a couple of interesting rumors that surfaced on an EQSS message board about a new armor type, and new weapon molds. I can t validate either one right
ygData.messageBody:
There's a couple of interesting rumors that surfaced on an EQSS message
board about a new armor type, and new weapon molds. I can't validate either
one right now, as I'm at work. I wouldn't even have mentioned them here, or
even given them a second thought, except for the fact that I've spoken with
3 guides and a GM (approximately 2 weeks ago; all on Bertox) about smithing
steel/plate armor; all of whom say that the ability to smith weapons and new
armor types will be eventually added in. They couldn't give me specifics as
nothing was finalized, but they eluded to the fact that it would be added in
soon. Any help in this matter would be appreciated. Here are the 2 rumors:

1.) Supposively there have been weapon molds seen somewhere near the Fishing
Village in West Karana or the Inn in Qeynos hills. The rumor continues on
about the molds being recently added in around the same time as the new
tailoring patterns.

2.) On Tunare, (I believe) someone claims to be able to make "tin" armor.
This armor is supposed to be as good as banded but much more light weight,
and is a smithable item.
